result.summary:
Virtual Agent License Differences in ITSM

ðŸ”¹ Standard

âœ— Virtual Agent is not included

Standard license users typically rely on:

  • Basic self-service portals
  • Standard request forms
  • Knowledge base articles

ðŸ”¹ Pro

âœ“ Virtual Agent is included

Pro license includes enhanced functionality:

  • Advanced virtual agent capabilities
  • Integration with other ServiceNow modules
  • Pre-built topic templates
  • NLU capabilities
  • Multi-channel support

ðŸ”¹ Pro+

âœ“ Virtual Agent is included

Pro+ license includes premium functionality:

  • All Pro capabilities
  • Advanced AI capabilities
  • LLM integration with Now Assist
  • Knowledge Graph integration
  • Enterprise-grade features

ðŸ”¹ Enterprise

âœ“ Virtual Agent is included

Enterprise license includes premium functionality:

  • All Pro capabilities
  • Advanced AI capabilities
  • LLM integration with Now Assist
  • Knowledge Graph integration
  • Enterprise-grade features

Summary

Virtual Agent requires at minimum a Pro license.
